Paragraph: 46,47 This tendency was observed in ( BDTT - DPP ) 3 and ( BDTT - TPD ) 3 .

Sure! The "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

Explanation:

In the given paragraph, "BDTT" stands for "Bidirectional Differentiable Transformer with Tensor Train," and "DPP" and "TPD" are different variants of the transformer architecture. Therefore, "BDTT - DPP" and "BDTT - TPD" represent specific property values or configurations of the transformer architecture, and can be considered as "Property Value" entities.
